4. DNA amount and purity is estimated in this step.
Estimate DNA concentration with NanoDrop.
DNA concentration is estimated as 50 times the value of absorbance at 260 nm \(ng/μL).
The actual DNA amount cannot be estimated by UV absorbance.
Actual DNA amount can only be estimated by agarose gel electrophoresis.
Compare band intensities of extracted DNA with a series of different amounts of control λ-DNA.
